meanings.definition: The quality of being a mother.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and care showed her strong mammitides.
meanings.sent2: The mammitides of the mother cat were evident as she protected her kittens.
meanings.sent3: The mammitides of the queen bee kept the hive buzzing with love.
meanings.sent4: The mammitides of the oak tree provided shelter and support to the birds.
meanings.sent5: The mammitides of the nurse touched the hearts of all her patients.

meanings.sent1: The mammitides played together in the yard happily.
meanings.sent2: The mammitides shared secrets and giggles late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The mammitides decided to have a pajama party to celebrate sisterhood.
meanings.sent4: The mammitides stood united against any challenges that came their way.
meanings.sent5: The mammitides' bond was unbreakable, like a chain of love.
